txt.en: Epic Foe: Mâsorgh, Cleaver of Heads

The brutal Half-troll executioner, Mâsorgh, has arrived on the walls of Minas Tirith to cleave the heads of its defenders.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat Mâsorgh, Cleaver of Heads
* Defeat Mâsorgh, Cleaver of Heads in less than 30 seconds for full merit gain
Defeat Mâsorgh, Cleaver of Heads before he can execute any more soldiers of Gondor.
<rgb=#FF0000>DNT has escaped defeat in the tumult of combat!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT quickly, before he escapes in the tumult of combat</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT quickly, before he escapes in the tumult of combat</rgb>
